successes.title: Castle Story
successes.description: Castle Story is a voxel-based creative strategy game about building castles brick by brick and defending them against enemies.

Pledges.description: Get the BETA at a pre-release price and get your name in the final game. The BETA WILL BECOME THE FINAL GAME, we are going to update that version to you for free, forever until the final release.
Get the original PROTOTYPE soon after the Kickstarter is over! You also get the BETA at a pre-release price with free updates for life and get your name in the final game. (see reward above)
Get TWO COPIES OF THE BETA at a pre-release price with free updates for life as well as two names in the game (yours and a second one of your choice).

Get TWO COPIES OF THE PROTOTYPE soon after the Kickstarter is over! You also get TWO COPIES OF THE BETA at a pre-release price with free updates for life as well as two names in the game (yours and a second one of your choice).
Get a Castle Story POSTER of your choice (see picture below) as well as the PROTOTYPE, the BETA and your name in the game.
Get a Castle Story T-SHIRT of your choice (see picture below) as well as the PROTOTYPE, the BETA and your name in the game.
Get both Castle Story POSTERS (see picture below) as well as the PROTOTYPE, the BETA and your name in the game.
Get one T-SHIRT of your choice, one POSTER of your choice (see picture below) as well as the PROTOTYPE, the BETA and your name in the game.
Get all three Castle Story T-SHIRTS (see picture below) as well as the PROTOTYPE, the BETA and your name in the game.
Get all three Castle Story T-SHIRTS and both Castle Story POSTERS (see pictures below) as well as the PROTOTYPE, the BETA and your name in the game.

Become a PREMIUM BACKER. Get all three Castle Story T-SHIRTS and both Castle Story AUTOGRAPHED POSTERS (see pictures below) as well as the PROTOTYPE and the BETA. Your name will be featured prominently in the game.

Become an ELITE BACKER. Get all three Castle Story T-SHIRTS and both Castle Story AUTOGRAPHED POSTERS (see pictures below) as well as the PROTOTYPE and the BETA. You also get a limited edition handmade BRICKTRON PLUSHIE! Your name will also be featured prominently in the game.

Become an ATOMIC BACKER!!! Get all three Castle Story T-SHIRTS and both Castle Story AUTOGRAPHED POSTERS (see pictures below) as well as the PROTOTYPE and the BETA. You also get a limited edition handmade BRICKTRON PLUSHIE and a special ATOMIC-BACKERS ONLY T-SHIRT! We'll make sure your name will be featured more prominently than anyone else in the game and we will create a special video to thank you personally.
